name: AMERICAN SOCIETY OF CONSULTANT PHARMACISTS (ASCP)
description: Improve access to long term care pharmacy services for Medicare beneficiaries at home.
sampleDescriptions: Expand coverage of long term care pharmacy services delivered at home or in the community.
